alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 31 at 8:36PM MST until August 31 at 9:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 945 PM MST. * At 835 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Laveen, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Chandler, Glendale, Tempe, Avondale, Paradise Valley, Tolleson, Laveen, Cashion, Litchfield Park, Papago Park, Piestewa Peak Park, South Phoenix, North Mountain Park, and Arizona State Fairgrounds. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 210. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 10. US Highway 60 between mile markers 151 and 175. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 1 and 9, and near mile marker 55. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 2 and 9. This includes AZ Interstate 10 between 129 and 161. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
